overview: High in the mountains, a lonely plane tree grows on a rock. The legend says that in ancient times, the beautiful girl Aisulu threw herself from this cliff, not wanting to reconcile herself with fate and get the unloved one. So, as a memory of her, a beautiful plane tree has grown in this place ... Drawing the images of our contemporaries, showing Aisula of our days, who has become a victim of gossip and prejudice due to cowardice, cowardice and moral betrayal of her two men, the authors of the film affect great moral - ethical issues.
title: Plane Tree on the Rock
